lyrics:
Things are good...oh yeah
We're doing well...he's right
We're better off...so true
We're all for you...right on
Taking more than you confess
In pursuit of your happiness

Blinded by the sunshine
Crystal clear blue sky
Wasted out of our minds
You're fine...you're fine
Taking more than you confess
In pursuit of your happiness

I don't wanna do without
No I don't wanna do without
I don't wanna do without
